title: Blood Trade
description: A mission goes wrong…Two members of the Kinir Elite disappear during an undercover mission. A terrorist holds their lives in the palms of his hands as he tortures them for his own entertainment. The remaining four members scramble to find their missing teammates – before they're dead.War is brewing…A King of mixed-blood fights against his own people. The terrorist will stop at nothing to ensure a pure-blood rules the land. His numbers grow as more and more join his side, just to save their own lives. Death awaits them all…Death looms over the team as they fight to protect a noble King, their allies, and their selves. Will death finally catch them this time?
author: Anastasia V. Pergakis
